title: Bajaj Auto to launch CNG bikes in FY25, will be priced higher than petrol vehicles
description: Bajaj Auto is developing a range of CNG motorcycles, set to launch in FY25. The company urges the government to reduce GST on CNG bikes to 12% to promote their adoption. These motorcycles will target mileage-conscious consumers and will have a special tank for both petrol and CNG fuel options. Bajaj Auto acknowledges the need for an extensive network of CNG filling stations for the success of these bikes. The company is also actively promoting electric vehicles alongside CNG options.
